mapper.select: SELECT reserve_count ,qna_count,reply_count,like_count,cu.USER_POINT AS USER_POINT FROM CON_USER cu , (SELECT COUNT(cr.reserve_seq) AS reserve_count FROM con_user cu,CON_RESERVE cr WHERE cu.USER_ID =cr.USER_ID AND cu.USER_ID =#{user_id}) crr , (SELECT count(cq.QNA_SEQ) AS qna_count FROM con_user cu, CON_QNA cq WHERE cu.user_id=cq.USER_ID AND cu.user_id=#{user_id}) cqq , (SELECT count(cr.REPLY_SEQ) AS reply_count FROM con_user cu, CON_REPLY cr WHERE cu.user_id=cr.USER_ID AND cu.user_id=#{user_id}) cry, (SELECT count(cl.LIKE_LIST_SEQ) AS like_count FROM con_user cu, CON_LIKE cl WHERE cu.user_id=cl.USER_ID AND cu.user_id=#{user_id}) cll WHERE cu.USER_ID=#{user_id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT U.USER_ID ,C.CATEGORY_CODE , C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM CON_USER U, CON_INTERESTS I, CON_CATEGORY C WHERE U.USER_ID = I.USER_ID AND I.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE AND U.USER_ID = #{USER_ID} ) A, (SELECT S.STORE_SEQ ,S.OWNER_ID ,S.STORE_NAME, M.CATEGORY_CODE FROM CON_STORE S,CON_CATEGORY_MAIN M WHERE S.STORE_SEQ =M.STORE_SEQ) B WHERE A.CATEGORY_CODE = B.CATEGORY_CODE;
